com.smartthings.sdk.smartapp.core

Interface Handler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConfigurationHandler, ConfirmationHandler, ConfirmationHandler, EventHandler, InstallHandler, OAuthCallbackHandler, PingHandler, UninstallHandler, UpdateHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultConfirmationHandler, DefaultEventHandler, DefaultPingHandler, NoopUninstallHandler
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Handler
